entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon then snow changing to 40 percent chance of flurries or drizzle this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 17 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
